TopicTitle: mod for colour stock parts (kerbpaint alike)

Articles.Content:
Hi! since seems kerbpaint is not working anymore, i will love to see a similar mod to colour stock parts and personalize our crafts.

Thanks for your attention, i really hope someone will work on it ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Bump, this is much needed and will make replicas even better. Please, make this happen.
